SPROCTOR Tutorial & Help

Welcome to the comprehensive guide for SPROCTOR, the cutting-edge AI-driven proctoring system designed to ensure academic integrity and fair examination processes. Whether you're an administrator, educator, or student, this tutorial will help you navigate and understand the powerful features of our intelligent proctoring solution.

System Overview

SPROCTOR is an advanced AI-powered proctoring system that revolutionizes online exam monitoring. Utilizing machine learning and real-time video analysis, we provide comprehensive exam security without compromising student privacy or comfort.

  • Real-time behavior monitoring
  • Advanced cheat detection algorithms
  • Seamless integration with existing learning platforms
  • Minimal system requirements

Getting Started

  1. Download the SPROCTOR application from our official website
  2. Install the application following the on-screen instructions
  3. Create an administrator account
  4. Configure system settings and permissions
  5. Verify system compatibility with your devices

Running a Proctored Exam

Follow these steps to conduct a secure online exam:

  1. Log in to your SPROCTOR administrator dashboard
  2. Select "Create New Exam"
  3. Configure exam parameters (time limit, allowed resources)
  4. Generate unique student access codes
  5. Monitor exam in real-time through the dashboard

Understanding Cheat Detection

Our AI analyzes multiple behavioral indicators to identify potential academic dishonesty:

  • Unusual head movements
  • Multiple face detection attempts
  • Background noise and movement
  • Unexplained screen transitions
  • Inconsistent typing patterns

Frequently Asked Questions

Does SPROCTOR work offline?

No, a stable internet connection is required for real-time monitoring.

What happens if a student looks away?

Prolonged absence from the camera view will trigger an alert and potential exam flag.

Troubleshooting

Poor Video Quality

Ensure good lighting, clean webcam, and minimum 720p resolution.

Detection Errors

Update to the latest software version and check system compatibility.
